channel.title: HL2 mod Lost Squad gets greenlit

item.title: HL2 mod Lost Squad gets greenlit
item.dc:creator: Slendgy
item.description:
I don’t know much about the content or tone of it, but just for the sake of the nightclub zombie arena, please valve let this be canon.

Read full topic
item.source: HL2 mod Lost Squad gets greenlit

item.title: HL2 mod Lost Squad gets greenlit
item.dc:creator: Gabe
item.description:
It looks… interesting. I can’t vouch for the screenshots as most of them don’t show anything too memorable or unique, albeit the ‘nightclub’, which doesn’t appear to fit into the Half-Life universe very well, although I’m curious about what direction the developer is going to take with it.

[attach=4121,none,477][/attach]

A grim trend with many mods released in Greenlight is that they never seem to be released, but that’s just me being jaded and cynical from years of hearing “We can’t give an exact release date right now.”. Regardless, I’m definitely going to follow this mod for updates, and silently pray this doesn’t fall under the pile of lost and forgotten mods.

Read full topic
